scripts.test-node: (yarn stop-node-server || true) && yarn build-node-server && yarn run-node-server && sleep 10 && yarn build-apache-bench && yarn run-apache-bench && yarn stop-node-server
scripts.test-node-heavy: export REQUESTS=20000 export CONCURRENCY=1000 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000/; yarn test-node
scripts.test-node-normal: export REQUESTS=10000 export CONCURRENCY=100 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000/; yarn test-node
scripts.test-node-light: export REQUESTS=100 export CONCURRENCY=5 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000/; yarn test-node
scripts.test-php: (yarn stop-php-server || true) && yarn build-php-server && yarn run-php-server && sleep 10 && yarn build-apache-bench && yarn run-apache-bench && yarn stop-php-server
scripts.test-php-heavy: export REQUESTS=20000 export CONCURRENCY=1000 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:9000/test-static.php; yarn test-php
scripts.test-php-normal: export REQUESTS=10000 export CONCURRENCY=100 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:9000/test-static.php; yarn test-php
scripts.test-php-light: export REQUESTS=100 export CONCURRENCY=5 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:9000/test-static.php; yarn test-php
